item.title: Python + Flask CRUD Application Scaffold
item.description: I have found it useful to prepare boilerplate code for spinning up things like a new application; in this article, I’ll share some code for prototyping an application that can create, retrieve, update, and delete records from a database using Flask. This walkthrough will assume familiarity with the command line, and that a Python 3 interpreter is available. For developers with experience with Django, Flask is familiar but with a smaller footprint, and leaves more up to the application architect when it comes to implementation details like form validation and data persistence.
